7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Muharib bin Dithar said:"Al-Aswad bin Yazid narrated to me from Abu Mahdhurah that the final words of the Adhan are: 'La ilaha illahha (there is none worthy of worship except Allah)

chapter.eng-name: The Final Words Of The Adhan
